LanguageData.Faithful.degreeDatas.faithful.label: faithful
LanguageData.Faithful.degreeDatas.faithful.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef} will never cheat on a partner, no matter how bad the relationship gets.
LanguageData.Philanderer.degreeDatas.philanderer.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} just cannot be trusted to stay faithful to a partner.
LanguageData.Polyamorous.degreeDatas.polyamorous.desc: {PAWN_nameDef} prefers romantic relationships involving multiple partners to monogamous relationships. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't mind if {PAWN_possessive} partners romance other people, but will be less happy in a restraining, monogamous relationship.
LanguageData.Straight.degreeDatas.straight.label: straight
LanguageData.Straight.degreeDatas.straight.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically attracted to people of the opposite gender.
